QuestData.Title: Darkblaze, Brood of the Worldbreaker
QuestData.Description: As Troteman cuts out, the world around you grows eerily silent. In the distance you see a full grown black dragon!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Horn of Summoning to call for Darkblaze. Defeat Darkblaze.
QuestData.RewardText: <A single tear rolls down Troteman's left cheek.>$B$BThey died in defense of the Alliance. In defense of our kingdom! Heroes, all of them, and they will be laid to rest as such.
